name: Donut Abductor
description:
Humans seem to be obsessed with these things they call "donuts". We should try to retrieve some samples for further study.

To avoid suspicion, use our new wifi-based mind control to grab the box of samples and bring them to the abduction zone. (Warning: due to slow internet speeds, you may experience limited control and latency when using the mind control system)

Controls:

A key - send "turn left" command to human

D key - send "turn right" command to human

ESC - pause game
